defs: = ದಂಡನೆ.
= ದಂಡನಮಸ್ಕಾರ.
a prostrating by throwing one's body on the ground, facing downward, before another's feet.
the leader or head of an army.
a police officer.
any senior officer in the government.
an officer empowered to administer the law.
= ದಂಡನಾಥ - 1.
the wife of the chief of an army.
= ದಂಡನಾಯಕಿತಿ.
the science of political institutions or of the principles organisation, and methods of government and defence of the country.
a punishing by beating.
an awarding of punishment (as by a judge).
a being annoyed (either physically or mentally); agony.
the law or system of law dealing with cases involving or relating to, crime; criminal law.

(dance.) a posture in which the body is bent slightly at the waist, holding one palm in the shape of a swan at the breast, stretching the elbow out, and the other arm hung slightly away from the body with the hand hanging loosely.

(dance) another posture in which standing on one foot, raising the other leg bending it at the knee with one palm kept on that knee and the other arm hung slightly away from the body with the hand hanging loosely.
a man holding a staff, as a guard, doorkeeper, etc.
Yama, the God of Death, who awards punishment to human beings after their death.
a holder of a sceptre as a symbol of sovereignty.
Skanda, Śivā's son.
(dance) one of the movements above the ground, in which one foot is placed on the ground and bending the knee and moving the other foot forward quickly and then placed on the ground.
a violent attack; an assault.
harsh, rigorous punishment.
the tendency of awarding more rigorous punishment, than the crime or offence committed by the awardee deserves, considered as one of the defects in the administration of law.
a man who hangs a convict to death.
a useless, habitually lazy but gluttonous man.
a code of law relating to or dealing with cases involving or relating to, crime; criminal procedure code.
= ದಂಡನಮಸ್ಕಾರ.
= ದಂಡನಮಸ್ಕಾರ.
a punishing of a person mistaking him or her as the culprit.
(dance) a swinging of one's hand.
a company of travellers travelling together.
a march of an army on to conquer alien nation or nations.
(fig.) repeated unsuccessful attempts to pass an examination.
(Jain.) a kind of divine weapon that a jaina emperor gets while marching to conquer his enemies.

(dance.) a movement in which the heel of one foot is placed on the other foot and raised up bending at the knee as to make the sole face the hind part of the body and then moving that foot quickly and placed on the ground.
a kind of dance.
the tree Elaeocarpus tuberculatus of Elaeocarpaceae family.
a man holding a staff, as a guard, doorkeeper, etc.
the captain of a unit of soldiers.
a non-implementation of punishment awarded by the court of law, considered as one of the shortcomings of a king.
to lie oneself on the ground facing downward, at the feet of a deity or a person in obeisance.
a deceitful man.
(prob. wrong form of 'daṇḍalu').
an order of the court of law awarding punishment.
a fight between two or among several persons using sticks or cudgels.
a mutual fighting using club or staff as weapons.
= ದಂಡನಾಥ - 1.
= ದಂಡನಾಥ - 1.
= ದಂಡನಾಥ - 1.
a man empowered to award punishment according to laws; a judge.
a giving of meanings of the words in a verse in the order of their placement rather than rearranged order based on the intention of the poet.
the state revenue collected by way of fines imposed as punishments.
a heavy club with a metal head, used as a war weapon in medieval period.
the yam plant Dioscorea alata of Dioscoreaceae family.
its yam; white yam.
a kind of sīre (the oblong, unsewn cloth, having a long coloured stripe running along the border.
a variety of bow.
= ದಂಡಾಯುಧ.
buttermilk got after churning butter from milk with a churning stick.
a man serving in an army; a soldier.
the quality of being worthy of esteem or honour; worthiness; dignity.
the quality of being able; power to do, bear etc.; ability; capacity.
the act, fact or process of exerting; active use of strength, power, etc.; vigorous action.
the quality or fact of excelling another in quantity, quality, merit, etc.
physical fight; conflict; strife; contention.
a way; manner or mode.
the state or condition of being the same in power, value, rank, etc.; equality.
the state or quality of being obstinate; stubbornness; obstinacy.
a form of Goddess Pārvati.
a thick stick or staff.
the long, thick part of vīṇe, tambūri, etc, on which the main strings pass.
a thick, short piece of wood hung to the neck of cattle to restrain them from moving fast.
the crossbar of a balance; the beam.
a carpenteṛs tool with a curved blade attached to a long handle at right angle, used for trimming and smoothing wood; an adze.
a long, thin staff held by a Brāhmaṇa student or an ascetic.
an army of soldiers.
a group of people.
the quarters assigned for a troop or troops; cantonment.
a type of physical exercise in which, standing on the toes and the palms, the body is lowered (without allowing the knees to touch the ground), and slightly pushed forward bending the back upward.
a kind of lock or hold in wrestling.
a holding of a stringed bow in the left hand stretched forward, i.e. in a ready position to shoot arrows.
a thick club used as a weapon in wars.
a broad piece of armor, varying widely in form and size, carried apart from the body, usu. on the left arm, to avoid being hit by swords, lances, arrows, etc.; a shield.
a man holding a staff, as a guard, door-keeper, etc.
an ascetic or student who carries a long, thin staff for religious purpose.
Yama, who holds a mace-like weapon.
a man who is equal in power, strength, value, rank, etc.
a stick; a staff.
a row; a line; a series.
a rope.
a string of pearls; a necklace.
a long, thin stick carried by a religious brāhmaṇa student or an ascetic.
a man serving in an army; a soldier.
a thick stick or staff.
the long, thick part of vīṇe, tambūri, etc, on which the main strings pass.
a musical instrument having such part, as vīṇe, tambūri, etc.
the crossbar of a balance; the beam.
a bone connecting the sternum with the scapula; the collarbone; the clavicle.
a string of pearls; a necklace.
the crossbar of a balance.
chastised; punished.
defeated; conquered.
a man who is punished.
a community the members of which sing folk songs in a style specific to them.
a male member of this community.
the plant Eriolaena hookeriana of Sterculiaceae family.
a kind of net attached to a handle, used to catch small animals and birds.
the quality of going, acting beyond the usual, reasonable or lawful limit; the inclination of the mind to do so.
to subject a person to punishment; to punish.
to strike with the hand or a weapon.
to reproach or chide strongly.
to overcome by physical force; to defeat; to conquer.
to break or intercept (an array of opponent's army, etc.).
to tie firmly into a bundle.
to restrain from using force.
a long, thin staff held by a brāhmaṇa student or an ascetic.
an army of soldiers.
a group of people or animals; a crowd; a swarm.

the quarters assigned for a troop or troops; cantonment. ದಂಡಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಸೋದರಮಾವನೇ? daṇḍinalli sōdaramāvanē? (prov.) one should not have sentimental attachments with another in business; trade knows neither friends nor kindred.
an attack by an army.
to arrange (a troop) to camp at some place.
to march with an army against.
a man serving in an army; a soldier.
a girl or woman who is strong, aggressive or who has the characteristic of boys as roughness, quarrelsomeness, absence of grace, gentleness, modesty, etc.
goods stolen or taken by force from a captured enemy city in wartime.
a man of the enemy side captured by an army in wartime.
to receive a sum of money, valuables etc. (from one's enemy who is defeated in a war, as acknowledgement of subjugation).
a string of flowers.
a length or loop of like things threaded, strung or hung on a string (as of pearls); a string.
a cluster, a bunch, a collection of flowers, held or fastened together at one end.
a kind of ornament worn on the head.
the land along the edge of a sea, lake, broad river, etc.; the shore or bank.
nearness; proximity.

ದಂಡೆಗೆ ಹಚ್ಚು daṇḍege haccu to bring to a safer, better or steadier position; ದಂಡೆಗೆ ಹತ್ತು danḍege hattu to overcome one's difficulty or danger and reach a safer state; ದಂಡೆ ಸೇರು daṇde sēru to accomplish; to come to the end successfully.
a type of physical exercise in which, standing on the toes and the palms, the body is lowered (without allowing the knees to touch the ground), and slightly pushed forward bending the back upward.
a kind of lock or hold in wrestling.
a holding of a stringed bow in the left hand stretched forward, i.e. in a ready position to shoot arrows.
a thick club used as a weapon in wars.
a broad piece of armor, varying widely in form and size, carried apart from the body, usu. on the left arm, to avoid being hit by swords, lances, arrows, etc.; a shield.
to put up a bund, ridge as to direct the flow of water in a particular direction or to avoid it.
to tie (flowers) into a string.
= ದಂಡೆಕಟ್ಟು1.
= ದಂಡೆಕಟ್ಟು2.
a cylindrical stone used to grind spices in kitchen.
to come nearer; to approach.
to sit with one knee touching the ground and the heels of the same foot is raised, placing the sole of another foot flat on the ground and knee bent.
= ದಂಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳು.
to set or place (something) in its original or normal place.
= ದಂಡೆಗೊಳ್ಳು.
to come nearer; to approach.
to hold (in the palm).
to be ready; to be in a prepared condition.
a tuft-like head ornament.
to march with an army against.
the plant Vernonia cinerea of Asteraceae family, the juice of the leaves of which are used to heal wounds on the body.
= ದಂಡೋತ್ಪಲ.
the act of proclaiming widely in public, usu. beating a drum; proclamation.
the large-sized tree Elaeocarpus tuberculatus of Elaeocarpaceae family, with soft wood which is used in making match-stick and packing cases.
another tree Elaeocarpus aristatus of the same family.
= ದಂಡ್ಲ.

any of a set of hard, bonelike structures set in the jaws of most vertebrates that consists typically of a sensitive, vascular pulp surrounded by dentin and coated on the crown with enamel and on the root with cementum, and used for biting, tearing, chewing, and also as weapons of attack or defence; a tooth.
a very long, large, pointed tooth, usu. one of a pair, projecting outside the mouth in elephants, wild boars, walruses, etc., and used for defence, digging up food, etc.; a tusk.
the crest or summit of a hill or mountain ending in a point; a peak.
the table land by the side or around a mountain.
a thick growth of shrubs or underbrush; a thicket.
the thin point, tip of a weapon (as of a sword).
the plant Croton tigilium of Euphorbiaceae family the seeds of which are used as a purgative.
(math.) the symbol for the number thirty-two.
(hist.) an ancient tax.

a non-historical and unverifiable story, narration of an incident, etc prevalent among a generation or handed down for generations among a people and popularly believed to have a historical basis, although not verifiable; a legend.
= ದಂತಕತೆ.
a kind of disease of teeth.
a slender stick of plants, esp. of neem tree, used for brushing teeth.
the tip of the tusk of an elephant.
a dent made by a bite of teeth.
a place or situation that is mere academic and remote from worldly or practical affairs; an ivory-tower.
the shaking of a tooth or teeth as from a disease or old-age.
any powder prepared and used for cleaning teeth; dentifrice; tooth-powder.
the lips which covers the teeth.
bitten with the teeth.
the act of cleaning of teeth.
a slender stick of plants, esp. of neem tree, used for brushing teeth.
the acacia tree Acacia catechu of Mimosae family.
an inflamed pus-filled swelling of the jaw caused by infection.
a row of teeth.
a kind of ear-ring.
either of the two bony parts (lower jaw or upper jaw) that holds the teeth; the jaw.
= ದಂತನೂತಿ.
= ದಂತಧಾವನ - 1.
a thin, yellow or yellowish coating on the teeth due to not cleaning properly.
articulated with the tip of the tongue against or near the front teeth; dental.
any of the consonants articulated with the tip of the tongue against or near the front teeth ( as consonants ತ, ಥ, ದ, ಧ, ನ, ಲandಸ); a dental consonant.
the medium sized deciduous tree Ehretia laevis of Ehretiaceae family.
= ದಂತಚ್ಛದ.
a disease of teeth, characterised by bleeding and bad breath.
the science of diagnosing, treating, curing, and preventing disease, decay, and preserving soundness of human teeth and jaws; dentistry.

a man dealing with the prevention and treatment of diseases and malformations of the teeth, gums, and oral cavity, and the removal, correction, and replacement of decayed, damaged or lost parts, including such operations as the filling and crowning of teeth, the straightening of teeth, and the construction of artificial dentures; a dentist.
a female dentist (see 'ದಂತವೈದ್ಯ - 2' above).
the sour taste that causes a painful feeling in the jaw where the tooth is or teeth are damaged.
the citrus tree Citrus medica of Rutaceae family; lemon tree.
its small, egg-shaped, edible frit with a pale-yellow rind and a juicy, sour pulp; lemon.
the tree Feronia limonia (= f. elephantum) of Rutaceae family.
its hard-shelled edible fruit; wood apple.
the small, short weed Oxalis corniculata (= O. pusilla, = Xanthoxalis corniculata) of Oxalidaceae family, with sour, edible leaves; wood sorrel.
= ದಂತಶಠ - 4.
= ದಂತಕ್ಷತ.
a disease of the teeth, that decays them and causes a painful feeling when a sour or cold food is put into the mouth.
a tooth that is, in the initial stage of growth, just pushing its tip out of the gum.
= ದಂತಚ್ಛದ.
a physical fighting between two persons in which each of them use their teeth as weapons.
= ದಂತಾವಲ.
a disease characterised by a malignant growth in the jaws; the teeth-cancer.
= ದಂತಚ್ಛದ.
a tusked elephant.
an elephant in general.
= ದಂತಾವಲ.
a tusked elephant (but in gen. any elephant).
the plant Croton tigilium of Euphorbiaceae family.
its seed which is used as a purgative.
the plant Baliospermum montanum (= B. axillare, = Croton polyandrus of the same family.
the plant Datura stramonium of Solanaceae family.
the plant Anthericum tuberosum (= Chlorophytum tuberosum) of Liliaceae family.
(math.) a symbol for the number eight.
a soldier mounted on an elephant.
a woman whose slow and majestic gait resembles that of an elephant.
a female elephant.
a man who attends to and takes care of an elephant or elephants.
having projected teeth.
not even; not level or flat; uneven.
spread; scattered over a wide or wider area.
erected (as hair).
a wheel having a series of teeth (for transmitting or receiving motion); a cogged wheel.
spread or scattered over; covering a relatively wider area.
having teeth or teeth-like projections or bristles.
filled with or abounding with.
the fact of having a dent or dent on the surface.
(gram.) articulated using the lips and the tip of the tongue near the front teeth; labiodental.
(gram.) a consonant articulated using the lips and the tip of the tongue near the front teeth (as ವ); a labiodental.
articulated with the tip of the tongue against or near the front teeth; dental.
any of the consonants articulated with the tip of the tongue against or near the front teeth ( as ತ, ಥ, ದ, ಧ ಲ, and ಸ ); a dental consonant.
an onomatopoeic word imitating the fierce burning sound, occurring repeatedly.
a noisy situation.
ದಂದಣ ದತ್ತಣ ಎನ್ನು dandaṇa dattaṇa ennu to ask or beg for humbly and imploringly; ದಂದಣಾ ದತ್ತಣಾ ಎನ್ನು dandaṇā dattaṇā ennu = ದಂದಣ ದತ್ತಣ ಎನ್ನು.
a man who spends possessions or money extravagantly or wastefully; prodigal; a spendthrift.
a woman who spends possessions or money extravagantly or wastefully; prodigal; a spendthrift.
the tendency of spending money extravagantly or wastefully.

any of various limbless, scaly, elongate reptiles of the suborder Serpentes, with lidless eyes, a tapering tail, comprising venomous and non-venomous species inhabiting tropical and temperate areas; a snake.
to cause to be consumed by fire.
to cause sharp mental pain or a stinging sensation.
burning; consuming as fire.
inflicting sharp mental pain.
= ದಂದಣ.
a complicated condition solving of which is difficult.
difficulty; annoyance; harassment.
the fact or condition of being difficult; difficulty.
an interfering and entangling oneself in another's business, affairs.
a deed that is unsocial or unlawful.
an activity or interest pursued by strong inclination of the mind and not as a main occupation; a hobby.
the act of associating or the state of being associated with.
a specific task done as part of the routine of one's occupation or for earning one's bread.
a man who commits wicked, criminal act; a wrong doer; a criminal.
to subject (another) to difficulty or difficulties or to put to inconvenience, exertion or pains.
= ದಂದುಗಬಡು.
= ದಂದುಗಬಡು.
= ದಂದುಗಬಡು.
to undergo difficulty or difficulties or be subject to inconvenience, exertion or pains.
a woman who spends money extravagantly or wastefully; prodigal; a spendthrift.
= ದಂಧನೆ.
to cheat; to defraud.
an act of cheating.
the fact, condition or an instance of being deceived by misleading appearance or image; illusion; misapprehension.
a means of earning one's living; occupation; livelihood.
anything one has to do; task; duty.
the buying and selling of commodities or the bartering of goods; trade; commerce.
a man and a woman who are married to each other; a couple.
two similar or corresponding things joined, associated or used together; a pair.
the third sign of the zodiac, entered by the sun about 21st day of May; the Gemini.
to join (a man and a woman) in marriage.
a veneration or obeisance shown to elder couples before auspicious ceremonies as marriage.
the ruddy goose, the male and female of which are supposed to be together always.
the act or an instance of cheating.
a pretending to be what one is not or to feel what one does not feel, esp., a pretense of virtue, piety, etc.; hypocrisy.
an unduly high opinion of oneself, one's merits, possession, status, etc.; exaggerated self-conceit; pride; vanity.
a man whose actions belie stated beliefs; he who pretends to have virtues, moral or religious beliefs, principles, etc., which he does not actually possess; a hypocrite.
a cheat; a deceiver; a fraud.
an entertainer who is skilled in producing illusion by sleight of hand, deceptive devices, etc.; a magician.
a snake charmer.
great or special power, ability or faculty.
haughty or arrogant behaviour.
a coin of smallest denomination or value (now archaic).
to behave in a manner intended to attract attention.
to deceive another with pleasing words or showy behaviour.
= ದಂಬ.
a bamboo split lengthwise.
a split bamboo, used as a chute for passing water in farms.
ostentatious show or display; pomp.
a man having too high an opinion of himself; a self-conceited man.
the quality of person given to show and vanity.
the behaviour of a person who pretends to be very holy, pious, upright, kind etc.; the hypocritical behaviour.
the thunder that accompanies a flash of lightning.
(myth.) the bolt or missile of Indra, the Lord of Gods.
a kind of sweet made using the fleshy part of the gourd of Cucurbita pepo (popularly known as ash gourd).
the act of biting or stinging; a bite.
a kind of fly that bites; a gadfly.
a wound caused by biting.
a tooth or stinging organ.
that bites or stings.
that which bites or stings.
any of various dipterous insects, esp. a house-fly.
any eatable that is cut, torn and chewed using teeth.
the act of biting or stinging.
a defensive, usu. flexible, covering for the body used by soldiers; an armour.
a protective metal plate for the sides of an elephant in a battlefield.
torn, chewed using teeth; bitten; stung.
covered with a protective armour.
a protruded, usu. one of a pair, tooth, as of an elephant, wild boar, etc., which is used as a weapon of self-defence, as a tool for digging, etc.; a tusk.
= ದಂಷ್ಟ್ರ.
that, as an wild boar, monkey, etc. which uses its tusk or tusks or teeth as a weapon of defence.
that which has a tusk, as a wild boar.
= ದಂಷ್ಟ್ರ.
water.
= ದಖನ್.
the letter or the sound of 'ದ '.
(mus.) the onomatopoeic sound representing a group of three short syllables produced while playing a percussion instrument.
an abnormal infiltration into and excess accumulation of serous fluid in connective tissue or in a serous cavity, esp. causing with swelling of the belly; dropsy; oedema.
strongly built or strong in substance; robust: sturdy; muscular; burly.
a strong, well-built, robust man.
the quality of being strong, effective, influential or having ability to perform well or in a manner that is above normal or being plentiful.
a stout, fat man.
the quality of being brave, fearless; the inclination towards adventures; dauntlessness.
the quality of frightening or tyrannising over others; a bullying.
a brave, daring or adventurous woman.
a man who is habitually cruel or who frightens others.
= ದಕ್ಕಡ1.
= ದಕ್ಕಡ2.
a brave, daring or adventurous man.

something that attracts attention or is worth looking at; a remarkable sight.
to rebuke, reprimand with strong words.
a sub-caste of mādigas.

an eye-ball that is unable to function normally.
(the eye) to lose its normal power.
= ದಕ್ಕಾಲಿಬೀಳು.
= ದಕ್ಕಾಲಿಬೀಳು.
= ದಕ್ಷಿಣ.
to take (something) into one's control or under one's power to dispose of.
to digest food eaten.
(fig.) to make something one's own (esp. that which do not belong to oneself).
to be got, acquired by; to accrue to.
to come under the control of; to be subject to another's check, regulation or authority.
to be digested (as food).
(a wrong doing, transgression, etc.) to be, become or seem to be right
ದಕ್ಕು ಹಾಕಿಕೊಳ್ಳು dakku hākikoḷḷu to make something (that belongs to another or others) one's own as by force or illegally.
to increase oneself in volume, quantity or degree.
to become arrogant; to behave very haughtily or imperiously.
to become enthusiastic, zealous or elated (as from joy).
the fact of being under someone's control or ownership.
a thick, round piece of wood, tapered at one end.
a long, metal weapon having a pointed end.
the lower part of a plant remaining above the ground or of hair projecting on the skin, after most of the upper portion is cut off; a stump.
the fact or condition of being arrogant.
the condition or fact of being zealous or enthusiastic.
to hand over something to another along with its legal ownership.
to bring something under one's control or ownership.
= ದಕ್ಕುಗೊಳ್.
to be owned; to be acquired.
a cylindrical percussion instrument consisting of a hollow cylinder or hemisphere with a membrane stretched tightly over both the ends, played by beating with the hands or sticks.

a kind of small, hour-glass shaped, hand-held percussion instrument, in which the two bands with a hard material tied to the free ends makes sounds by striking the leather membrane on either side, when shaken continuously.
the effect of a heavy stroke, collision; shock.
great danger; peril; jeopardy.
a religious rite performed by going round the deity, beating the percussion instrument ದಕ್ಕೆ.
having suitable or sufficient ability, power, skill, knowledge, experience, dexterity, etc., for some purpose; competent; able.
an able, competent, dexterous man.
(myth.) name of a son of Brahma, the Creator of the universe.
an ascetic known for his spiritual knowledge; a sage.
one of the twelve celebrated sages of the old Hindu tradition.
a male chicken; a cock; a rooster.
a being able to perform, conduct, manage, etc.; the physical or mental power required for the same.
the fact of moving, acting or responding quickly; quickness; swiftness.
the act or an instance of killing.
the right side.
the quality of being competent or able; the fact of having the required skill, power, dexterity etc.to do something.
(myth.) the ninth of the fourteen Manus, the successive progenitors and sovereigns of the earth.
a code of law, ascribed to ದಕ್ಷ, being one of the nineteen (or eighteen, according to some) authored by different sages.
of, pertaining to or located on or near the side of a person or thing that is turned toward the south when the subject is facing east; right.
in, of, to, toward or facing the south or relating to or from the southern region, country or countries.
in accordance with what is good, proper, honest or just; upright.
clever; dexterous; skilful.
the right side (of a person or thing).
the direction that is to the right of a person facing the sunrise; south.
the southern part of India comprising Andhra Pradesh, Teleŋgāṇa, Karnāṭaka, Tamil Nadu, Kerala States and the territory of Pondicherry.
a man of upright nature; an honest man.
one of the schools of Śaiva philosophy.
(astrol.) the fourth house from the house of birth, in the chart of horoscope.
the sacrificial fire kept at the southern part of the sacrificial hall (this being one of the three sacrificial fires).
the main male character in a drama who has equal love for each of his several heroines.
(mus.) name of a mode (rāga).
the right arm (of a person).
(fig.) the most helpful or reliable man.
the southern end of the earth's axis; the southernmost point on earth; the south pole.
the pole of a magnet that turn towards the south when hung free; south pole.
the main male character in a drama who has equal love for each of his several heroines.
(myth.) Yama, the Regent of South.
the imaginary circle drawn parallel to the equator at c. 66º 34' south of it; the antarctic circle.
the region (approx. 14,25,000 sq. Kms.) about the South Pole of the earth, which is the coldest part of the earth, regarded by some as a continent; The Antarctica.
the region of the earth between the Tropic of Capricorn (23o26') and Antarctic circle (66o34').
the ocean or the southern parts of the Indian, Pacific and Atlantic oceans that enclose the Antarctica; the Antarctic Ocean.
a man being on the right of another (as related to the later).
a man who drives a horse-drawn cart; a charioteer.
= ದಕ್ಷಿಣಾಯನ.
relating to the Southern India, South Indian languages, music or other arts.
that which is relating to the Southern India.
Karnāṭaka music system.
the part of India that is to the south of the Vindhya range of mountains.
= ದಕ್ಷಿಣಾಯನ.
the time when the sun changes the direction of his apparent journey at the Tropic of Capricorn (23o26' south of the celestial equator).
the day on which the sun changes the direction of his apparent journey at the Tropic of Capricorn (23o26' south of the celestial equator), regarded as most auspicious for rituals.
the intention of or desire for getting gifts, presents of money etc. (that is given to Brāhmaṇas on special occasions).
a person eligible for getting such gifts.
a fee, gift, etc. given to brāhmaṇas on religious occasions.
a giving of such gifts, etc.
